mapper.select: SELECT c.comu_code, c.comu_subject, c.comu_content, c.created_date, c.modified_date, u.user_code as "user.user_code" FROM comu_post c JOIN user u ON (c.user_code = u.user_code) WHERE c.del_status = false ORDER BY c.created_date DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT c.comu_code, c.comu_subject, c.comu_content, c.created_date, c.modified_date, u.user_code as "user.user_code" FROM comu_post c JOIN user u ON (c.user_code = u.user_code) WHERE c.comu_code = #{comuPostCode} AND c.del_status = false
